fields.name: registration_number
fields.title: Registration Number
fields.description: This field is populated by the user. It is a unique reference number given to each line item in the spreadsheet. Having a unique identifier for each item will allow users locate a specific item in the registry should they need to modify or delete. The Registration Number should respect the following format: C-XXXXXXX.

fields.name: partner_departments
fields.title: Partner Department(s)
fields.description: This field identifies the name(s) of the departments who are collaborating on the identified engagement process. Please provide the numerical code associated to each department and separated by commas.

fields.name: subjects
fields.title: Subjects
fields.description: This field indicates the different subjects related to the engagement process.

fields.name: title_en
fields.title: Consultation Title (English)
fields.description: This field identifies the complete name of the consultation in English.

fields.name: description_en
fields.title: Description (English)
fields.description: This field provides information regarding the nature of consultation and engagement activities in English. This includes a description of the main objectives and expected outcomes of the engagement process. Users are invited to explain how the engagement activities, methods and/or tools will help meet the consultation’s objectives.

fields.name: target_participants_and_audience
fields.title: Target Participants and Audience
fields.description: This field provides information regarding the target participants and audience of the engagement process.

fields.name: start_date
fields.title: Start Date
fields.description: This field indicates when a planned consultation will begin to accept input from participants.

fields.name: end_date
fields.title: End Date
fields.description: This field indicates the end date of the consultation. The consultation is considered closed when no more engagement activities will take place and/or when a department begins analysing the input received during the engagement process.

fields.name: status
fields.title: Status
fields.description: The field indicates the current status of the engagement process.

fields.name: profile_page_en
fields.title: Link to Consultations Profile Page (English)
fields.description: This field provides the link to the English engagement information profile page.

fields.name: report_available_online
fields.title: Report Available online
fields.description: This field indicates if the “What we Heard” report is completed, published and made available online on the Consulting with Canadians website.

fields.name: report_link_en
fields.title: Link to the “What we Heard” Report in English
fields.description: This field provides the link to the “What we Heard” report when it is available online.

fields.name: high_profile
fields.title: High Profile
fields.description: This field indicates whether the consultation or public engagement initiative is considered high profile. The consultation is considered high profile if it meets one or more of the criteria in the ‘Rationale’ field.

fields.name: rationale
fields.title: Rationale
fields.description: The field indicates the rationale that prompted the public engagement initiative. This field includes only criteria that define high profile public engagement.
